                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Iscurrent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SCDReason', 'string', 'no-op']
                                    ] 

        self.schemas['DMStudentType'] = [ 
                                        ['SKStudentType', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKStudentType', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentType', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentStatus', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']
                                    ]   
                                          

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMDetailedStudentPreSubmission'], '<partition>', '<key>')

        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMFactStudent'], '<partition>', '<key>')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMFactStudentEnrolment'], '<partition>', '<key>')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMPersonDemographic'], '<partition>', '<key>')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMStudent'], '<partition>', '<key>')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMStudentOrganisationDetails'], '<partition>', '<key>')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMStudentSchoolHistory'], '<partition>', '<key>')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'student', self.schemas['DMStudentType'], '<partition>', '<key>')
